name: Nway
tagline: Bundle commonjs javascript modules for the browser with cache optimisation: write browser side script the node's way !
body:
# nway

Transform synchronous Node CommonJS modules in optimized client side asynchronous (AMD-like) modules


---

Ongoing: transition to open-source publication.
